title: Matt Hancock – 2021 Comments on Pilot Events with Large Audiences
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Matt Hancock, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 5 April 2021.
content:
We are all longing to see stadiums full of sporting fans and gigs packed with music lovers, but as we continue the roll out of our vaccination programme, we must find a way to do so safely.
